article_text:
The 32 signature pages attached to the letter Congress sent President Obama about negotition over Iran's nuclear program contains names that cross party, race, and ethnic lines.

I can't wait for the White House to complain that Alcee Hastings, Sheila Jackson Lee, and Elijah Cummings oppose President Obama because of racial animus.
article_summary:
I can't wait for the White House to complain that Alcee Hastings, Sheila Jackson Lee, and Elijah Cummings oppose President Obama because of racial animus.
The 32 signature pages attached to the letter Congress sent President Obama about negotition over Iran's nuclear program contains names that cross party, race, and ethnic lines.
